Data ProductsÂ¶

Each recipe of the MEGARA Pipeline produces a set of predefined results, known as data products. In turn, the recipes may request different data products as computing requirements, effectively chaining the recipes.

For example, the requirements of the ff-mode-label recipe include a MasterDark object. This object is produced by the recipe DarkRecipe, which in turn requires a MasterBias object.

  • FITS Keywords
    • Primary header
    • Required by the pipeline
  • Raw Image data products
    • Readout modes
    • Image types
      • Bias
      • Dark
      • Flat
      • Object
  • Data products
    • Master Bias frames
    • Master Dark frames
    • Master Bad Pixel Mask
    • Master Traces
    • Master Weights
    • Master Wavelength Calibration
    • Master Fiber Flat
    • Master Slit Flat
    • Master Twilight Flat
    • Master LCB
    • Master MOS
    • Master LCB Fast Mapping
    • Master LCB std Star
    • Master MOS std Star
    • Master Sensitivity Star
    • Master Extinction Star
